structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 21, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1822-7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Director to enforce KRS 250.360 to 250.480 and make regulations.
